PackageType.title: Package
PackageType.description: The PackageType is the standard output format that can be used to describe one or more Malware Instances or Malware Families and the entities associated with them: Capabilities, Behaviors, Actions, CybOX Objects, and Collections and Relationships.

type.description: The value of this field MUST be "package"

id.description: The required id field specifies a unique ID for this Package.

schema_version.description: The required schema_version field specifies the version of the MAEC Package schema that the document has been written in and that should be used for validation.

malware_instances.description: The malware_instances field captures each of the Malware Instances contained in the Package.

malware_families.description: The malware_families field captures a set of one or more Malware Families relevant to the Package content.

items.type: REFERENCE PLACEHOLDER FOR STIX Observable Objects (stix:observable-objects

objects.description: The cybox field captures a set of one or more CybOX entities, such as CybOX Objects, relevant to the MAEC package.

behaviors.description: The Behaviors field captures a set of one or more Behaviors relevant to the Package content.

actions.description: The Actions field captures a set of one or more Actions relevant to the Package content.

collections.description: The Collections field specifies the particular collections that serve to group the MAEC entities encompassed in this Package, including Malware Instances.

relationships.description: The Relationships field captures the relationships between the entities in the MAEC document.
